mapper.select: SELECT UR.NICKNAME AS NICKNAME , AR.ACT_LOCATION AS ACT_LOCATION , AT.ACT_TYPE AS ACT_TYPE , AR.CONTENT AS CONTENT , AR.ACT_DATE AS ACT_DATE , AR.ACT_IMG AS ACT_IMG FROM USER_REG UR RIGHT JOIN ACT_REG AR ON UR.USER_CODE = AR.USER_CODE LEFT JOIN ACT_TYPE AT ON AR.ACT_TYPE = AT.ACT_TYPE_CODE WHERE AR.CAT_CODE=#{cat_code} AND AR.ACT_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24-MI-SS') AND TO_DATE((TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' 23:59:59'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24-MI-SS')

SELECT UR.NICKNAME AS NICKNAME , AR.ACT_LOCATION AS ACT_LOCATION , AT.ACT_TYPE AS ACT_TYPE , AR.CONTENT AS CONTENT , AR.ACT_DATE AS ACT_DATE , AR.ACT_IMG AS ACT_IMG FROM USER_REG UR RIGHT JOIN ACT_REG AR ON UR.USER_CODE = AR.USER_CODE LEFT JOIN ACT_TYPE AT ON AR.ACT_TYPE = AT.ACT_TYPE_CODE WHERE AR.CAT_CODE=#{cat_code, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AR.ACT_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{act_date, jdbcType=DATE}, 'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_DATE(#{act_date, jdbcType=DATE}, 'YYYYMMDD')+0.999999
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FOLLOW(FOLLOW_CODE, CAT_CODE, USER_CODE, FOLLOW_DATE) VALUES('FO' || FOLLOW_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{cat_id}, #{user_code},SYSDATE)
INSERT INTO GAL_REG(GAL_IMG_CODE, CAT_CODE, GAL_DATE, IMG_FILE) VALUES('GAIM' || GAL_IMG_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{cat_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, #{CAT_REP_IMG, jdbcType=VARCHAR});
